languages.text: "Воистину так, Ваша Светлость. Серф, блюститель, офицер, техножрец и туннельная крыса в едином порыве бьют мятежную нечисть. Единственные, кого среди нас нет — инфернусы. Они, похоже, были ядром заговора и предали в полном составе... или передушили тех, кто не был посвящен в план бунта, первыми".

"You are indeed correct, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Serfs, enforcers, officers, Tech-Priests, and tunnel rats have all united in their fight against the rebellious scum. The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."
languages.original_text: "Воистину так, Ваша Светлость. Серф, блюститель, офицер, техножрец и туннельная крыса в едином порыве бьют мятежную нечисть. Единственные, кого среди нас нет — инфернусы. Они, похоже, были ядром заговора и предали в полном составе... или передушили тех, кто не был посвящен в план бунта, первыми".

The only ones missing are the inferni. They seem to have been the backbone of the mutiny... And strangled those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

The only ones missing are the Inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

The only ones missing are the Inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

languages.text: «Tiene razón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Siervos, agentes, oficiales, tecnosacerdotes y ratas de los túneles, todos unidos en la lucha contra la escoria rebelde. Los únicos que nos faltan son los infernus. Parece que están en el centro de este motín... y han estrangulado a todos los que no eran conscientes de su pérfido plan».
languages.original_text: "You are indeed correct, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Serfs, enforcers, officers, Tech-Priests, and tunnel rats have all united in their fight against the rebellious scum. The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Siervos, agentes, oficiales, tecnosacerdotes y ratas de los túneles, todos unidos en la lucha contra la escoria rebelde. Los únicos que nos faltan son los infernus. Parece que están en el centro de este motín... y han estrangulado a todos los que no eran conscientes de su pérfido plan».

languages.text: 「その通りです、陛下。農奴、エンフォーサー、士官、技術司祭、トンネルのネズミ、みんなで力を合わせて反抗的なクズと戦ったのです。唯一不在なのはインフェルヌスですね。彼らがこの反乱の後ろ盾だったようで…そのうえ、彼らはこの卑劣な計画に手を貸さなかった者をすべて絞め殺したのです」
languages.original_text: "You are indeed correct, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Serfs, enforcers, officers, Tech-Priests, and tunnel rats have all united in their fight against the rebellious scum. The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです、陛下。農奴、エンフォーサー、士官、技術司祭、トンネルのネズミ、みんなで力を合わせて反抗的なクズと戦ったのです。唯一不在なのはインフェルヌスですね。彼らがこの反乱の後ろ盾だったようで…そのうえ、彼らはこの卑劣な計画に手を貸さなかった者をすべて絞め殺したのです」

languages.text: “您说的一点都没错，大人。仆役、执法者、军官、技术神甫，甚至连下水道的老鼠都团结起来，联合起来对付那些叛乱分子。唯一不在场的，就是控火公会的那群人，看来他们就是这场叛乱的主谋……他们杀害了那些对他们的卑劣计划毫无防备的船员。”
languages.original_text: "You are indeed correct, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Serfs, enforcers, officers, Tech-Priests, and tunnel rats have all united in their fight against the rebellious scum. The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

traits.locale_text: “您说的一点都没错，大人。仆役、执法者、军官、技术神甫，甚至连下水道的老鼠都团结起来，联合起来对付那些叛乱分子。唯一不在场的，就是控火公会的那群人，看来他们就是这场叛乱的主谋……他们杀害了那些对他们的卑劣计划毫无防备的船员。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt in der Tat recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sklaven, Enforcers, Offiziere, Techpriester und Tunnelratten haben sich allesamt vereint, um den Rebellenabschaum zu bekämpfen. Es fehlen nur die Inferni. Sie waren offenbar das Rückgrat dieser Meuterei ... Und sie haben alle erwürgt, die nicht in ihren schändlichen Plan eingeweiht waren."
languages.original_text: "You are indeed correct, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Serfs, enforcers, officers, Tech-Priests, and tunnel rats have all united in their fight against the rebellious scum. The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt in der Tat recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sklaven, Enforcers, Offiziere, Techpriester und Tunnelratten haben sich allesamt vereint, um den Rebellenabschaum zu bekämpfen. Es fehlen nur die Inferni. Sie waren offenbar das Rückgrat dieser Meuterei ... Und sie haben alle erwürgt, die nicht in ihren schändlichen Plan eingeweiht waren."

languages.text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Serfs, prévôts, officiers, technoprêtres et rats des tunnels ont su s'unir dans leur lutte contre la racaille rebelle. Seuls les inferni manquent à l'appel. Il semblerait qu'ils soient à l'origine même de cette mutinerie... et qu'ils aient étranglé tous ceux qui n'avaient pas connaissance de leur ignoble plan. »
languages.original_text: "You are indeed correct, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Serfs, enforcers, officers, Tech-Priests, and tunnel rats have all united in their fight against the rebellious scum. The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Serfs, prévôts, officiers, technoprêtres et rats des tunnels ont su s'unir dans leur lutte contre la racaille rebelle. Seuls les inferni manquent à l'appel. Il semblerait qu'ils soient à l'origine même de cette mutinerie... et qu'ils aient étranglé tous ceux qui n'avaient pas connaissance de leur ignoble plan. »

languages.text: "Evet, doğru söylüyorsunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Köleler, infazcılar, subaylar, Tekno Rahipler, tünel sıçanları... Adi isyancılara karşı savaşmak için hepsi bir araya geldi. Bir tek itfacılar eksik. Ayaklanmanın bel kemiğini onlar oluşturuyor... Hain planlarına ayak uydurmayanları da boğup öldürmüşler."
languages.original_text: "You are indeed correct, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Serfs, enforcers, officers, Tech-Priests, and tunnel rats have all united in their fight against the rebellious scum. The only ones missing are the inferni. It seems they were the backbone of this mutiny... And they strangled all those who were not privy to their dastardly plan."
